document_data.name: Mount Okk
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Okk''' was a mountain in the [[Alpuk]] region of the [[Great Glacier]].
document_data.Geography: Mount Okk was a tall mountain, up to {{SI|12000|ft|long=yes}} in elevation. Its height made it one of the tallest mountains within the [[Lugsaas Chain]]. Within a fissure at the base of the northern side of the mountain was the dangerous and mysterious [[Ice Castle]].
